df-uss
blocks.content: Define the uniform structure extractor function. Similarly with ~ df-topn this differs from ~ df-unif when a structure has been restricted using ~ df-ress ; in this case the ` UnifSet ` component will still have a uniform set over the larger set, and this function fixes this by restricting the uniform set as well. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: df-usp
blocks.content: Definition of a uniform space, i.e. a base set with an uniform structure and its induced topology. Derived from definition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.4. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: df-tus
blocks.content: Define the function mapping a uniform structure to a uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: ussval
blocks.content: The uniform structure on uniform space ` W ` . This proof uses a trick with ~ fvprc to avoid requiring ` W ` to be a set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ussval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, crest, cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cuss, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(c0, crest, cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cuss, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl6reqr(co(c0, crest, cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cuss, c2), co(cfv(cunif, c2), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cuss, co(cfv(cunif, c2), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))), co(cfv(cunif, cv(hs0)), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12d(cfv(cunif, cv(hs0)), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cunif, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cunif)
  sqxpeqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cbs)
  df-uss(hs0)
  ovex(cfv(cunif, c2), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  oveq12i(c0, crest, cxp(c1, c1), cfv(cunif, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  xpeq12i(c1, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
  3eqtr4a(co(c0, crest, cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cuss, c2), co(emptycls, crest, cxp(c1, c1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  0rest(cxp(c1, c1))
  oveq1d(c0, crest, cxp(c1, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(cunif, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cunif)
  fvprc(c2, cuss)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(cunif, c2), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ussval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[|`t](c1 √ó c1))=(UnifSt ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(UnifSet ` c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0[|`t](c1 √ó c1))=(UnifSt ` c2), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6reqr((c0[|`t](c1 √ó c1)), (UnifSt ` c2), ((UnifSet ` c2)[|`t]((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2))), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cuss, ((UnifSet ` c2)[|`t]((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2))), ((UnifSet ` hs0)[|`t]((Base ` hs0)√ó(Base ` hs0))))
  oveq12d((UnifSet ` hs0), crest, ((Base ` hs0)√ó(Base ` hs0)), (UnifSet ` c2), ((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2)), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cunif)
  sqxpeqd((Base ` hs0), (Base ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cbs)
  df-uss(hs0)
  ovex((UnifSet ` c2), crest, ((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2)))
  oveq12i(c0, crest, (c1 √ó c1), (UnifSet ` c2), ((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2)))
  xpeq12i(c1, c1, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c2))
  3eqtr4a((c0[|`t](c1 √ó c1)), (UnifSt ` c2), (‚àÖ[|`t](c1 √ó c1)), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  0rest((c1 √ó c1))
  oveq1d(c0, crest, (c1 √ó c1), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (UnifSet ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cunif)
  fvprc(c2, cuss)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(((UnifSet ` c2)[|`t]((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2))))
}

blocks.name: ussid
blocks.content: In case the base of the ` UnifSt ` element of the uniform space is the base of its element structure, then ` UnifSt ` does not restrict it further. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ussid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cuss, c2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cunif, c2))
} = {
  syl6eq(c1, cfv(cuss, c2), co(c1, crest, cxp(c0, c0)), wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)))
  eqtr2d(c1, co(c1, crest, cxp(c0, c0)), co(c1, crest, cuni(c1)), wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)))
  oveq2(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1), c1, crest)
  syl(wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)), wceq(co(c1, crest, cuni(c1)), c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylibr(wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cuni(c1), universe))
  syl6eqelr(cuni(c1), universe, cxp(c0, c0), wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)))
  id(wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cuni(c1)))
  xpex(c0, c0)
  fvexi(c0, cbs, c2)
  uniexb(c1)
  restid(c1, universe, cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  ussval(c1, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ussid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí c1 =(UnifSt ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(UnifSet ` c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(c1, (UnifSt ` c2), (c1[|`t](c0 √ó c0)), (c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1)
  eqtr2d(c1, (c1[|`t](c0 √ó c0)), (c1[|`t]‚ãÉ c1), (c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1)
  oveq2((c0 √ó c0), ‚ãÉ c1, c1, crest)
  syl((c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1, (c1[|`t]‚ãÉ c1)= c1, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylibr((c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1, c1 ‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqelr(‚ãÉ c1, universe, (c0 √ó c0), (c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1)
  id((c0 √ó c0)= ‚ãÉ c1)
  xpex(c0, c0)
  fvexi(c0, cbs, c2)
  uniexb(c1)
  restid(c1, universe, ‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  ussval(c1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: isusp
blocks.content: The predicate ` W ` is a uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm isusp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cusp), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cusp), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c1))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cusp)
  adantr(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  con4i(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbiri(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2))), wne(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  0nep0()
  necon3bbid(emptycls, csn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)))
  bitrd(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), wceq(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  syl6bb(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c1, csn(emptycls)), wcel(c1, csn(csn(emptycls))))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(cust, c2), csn(csn(emptycls)), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl6eq(cfv(cust, c2), csn(csn(emptycls)), cfv(cust, emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fveq2d(cust, c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  ust0()
  elsn(c1, csn(emptycls))
  fvexi(c1, cuss, c0)
  eqeq1d(c1, csn(emptycls), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cuss, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cuss)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cusp, wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cust, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cust, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c1)))
  eleq12d(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cust, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), c1, cfv(cust, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cust, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  eqeq12d(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0))), c3, cfv(cutop, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  fveq2d(cutop, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cuss, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuss)
  df-usp(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cutop, c1))))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà UnifSp ‚Üî(c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2)‚àß c3 =(unifTop ` c1)))

  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà UnifSp, (c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2)‚àß c3 =(unifTop ` c1)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)

  0nep0()
  necon3bbid(emptycls, { ‚àÖ }, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2))
  bitrd(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2), ‚àÖ = { ‚àÖ }, c1 = { ‚àÖ })
  syl6bb(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2), c1 = { ‚àÖ }, c1 ‚àà { { ‚àÖ } })
  eleq2d(c1, (UnifOn ` c2), { { ‚àÖ } }, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eq((UnifOn ` c2), { { ‚àÖ } }, (UnifOn ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fveq2d(cust, c2, emptycls, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, (Base ` c0), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  ust0()
  elsn(c1, { ‚àÖ })
  fvexi(c1, cuss, c0)

  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (UnifSt ` c0), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, cuss)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cusp, (c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2)‚àß c3 =(unifTop ` c1)), ((UnifSt ` hs0)‚àà(UnifOn `(Base ` hs0))‚àß(TopOpen ` hs0)=(unifTop `(UnifSt ` hs0))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (UnifSt ` hs0)‚àà(UnifOn `(Base ` hs0)), (TopOpen ` hs0)=(unifTop `(UnifSt ` hs0)), c1 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c2), c3 =(unifTop ` c1))
  eleq12d((UnifSt ` hs0), (UnifOn `(Base ` hs0)), c1, (UnifOn ` c2), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cust, (Base ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  eqeq12d((TopOpen ` hs0), (unifTop `(UnifSt ` hs0)), c3, (unifTop ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((TopOpen ` hs0), c3, (TopOpen ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ctopn)
  fveq2d(cutop, (UnifSt ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((UnifSt ` hs0), c1, (UnifSt ` c0), hs0 = c0)

blocks.name: ressunif
blocks.content: ` UnifSet ` is unaffected by restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ressunif(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cunif, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cress, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cunif, c4))
} = {
  resslem(c0, c1, c2, cunif, c3, c4, cdc(nat1, nat3))
  df-unif()
  decnncl(nat1, nat3)
  3nn()
  declti(nat1, nat1, nat3)
  1nn()
  3nn0()
  1nn0()
  1lt10()
}

  syl5eqr(cin(cfv(cbs, c2), c0), cfv(cbs, co(c2, cress, c0)), cin(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c0, c1))

  ‚ä£ c2 =(toUnifSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà UnifSp, (UnifSt ` c2)‚àà(UnifOn `(Base ` c2)), (TopOpen ` c2)=(unifTop `(UnifSt ` c2)))
  3eltr3d((UnifSt ` c2), (UnifOn `(Base ` c2)), c0, (UnifOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  id(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  fveq2d(cust, c1, (Base ` c2), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  tusbas(c0, c1, c2)
  3eqtr3d((TopOpen ` c2), (unifTop `(UnifSt ` c2)), (unifTop ` c0), (unifTop `(UnifSet ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  fveq2d(cutop, c0, (UnifSet ` c2), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  simp3d(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2), c1 =(Base ` c2), c0 =(UnifSet ` c2))
  tuslem(c0, c1, c2)
  fveq2d(cutop, (UnifSet ` c2), (UnifSt ` c2), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  eqtr3d((UnifSet ` c2), (UnifSt ` c2), c0, c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  tusunif(c0, c1, c2)
  tususs(c0, c1, c2)
  isusp(c2, (UnifSt ` c2), (Base ` c2), (TopOpen ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((UnifSt ` c2))
  eqid((TopOpen ` c2))
}

blocks.name: tustps
blocks.content: A constructed uniform space is a topological space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm tustps(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctus, c0))
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2))))
  3eltr3d(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopon, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  utoptopon(c0, c1)
  tustopn(c0, c1, cfv(cutop, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cutop, c0))
  fveq2d(ctopon, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  tusbas(c0, c1, c2)
  istps(c2, cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tustps(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà TopSp)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(toUnifSp ` c0)
} = {
  sylibr(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà TopSp, (TopOpen ` c2)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` c2)))
  3eltr3d((TopOpen ` c2), (TopOn `(Base ` c2)), (unifTop ` c0), (TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  utoptopon(c0, c1)
  tustopn(c0, c1, (unifTop ` c0), c2)
  eqid((unifTop ` c0))
  fveq2d(ctopon, c1, (Base ` c2), c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1))
  tusbas(c0, c1, c2)
  istps(c2, (TopOpen ` c2), (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((TopOpen ` c2))
}

blocks.name: uspreg
blocks.content: If a uniform space is Hausdorff, it is regular. Proposition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.5. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspreg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(c1, cha)), wcel(c1, creg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, creg, cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(c1, cha)))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0)), creg), wcel(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cust, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0)), cha))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cust, cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(c1, cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0))))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0)), cha, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(c1, cha)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(c1, cha), wceq(c1, cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cusp), wceq(c1, cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0))), wcel(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cust, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  isusp(c0, cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cuss, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cusp), wcel(c1, cha))
  utopreg(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cutop, cfv(cuss, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uspreg(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà UnifSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Haus)‚Üí c1 ‚àà Reg)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, creg, (unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà UnifSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Haus))
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà UnifSp, c1 ‚àà Haus, (unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0))‚àà Reg, (UnifSt ` c0)‚àà(UnifOn `(Base ` c0)), (unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0))‚àà Haus)
  simplbi(c0 ‚àà UnifSp, (UnifSt ` c0)‚àà(UnifOn `(Base ` c0)), c1 =(unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)))
  eqeltrrd((unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)), cha, c1, (c0 ‚àà UnifSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Haus))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà UnifSp, c1 ‚àà Haus, c1 =(unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà UnifSp, c1 =(unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)), (UnifSt ` c0)‚àà(UnifOn `(Base ` c0)))
  isusp(c0, (UnifSt ` c0), (Base ` c0), c1)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((UnifSt ` c0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà UnifSp, c1 ‚àà Haus)
  utopreg((UnifSt ` c0), (Base ` c0), (unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)))
  eqid((unifTop `(UnifSt ` c0)))
}
